ComicInfo.Summary:
The Whip of Fear!: Johnny Peril is framed for killing the First Minister of Baruga.
Collector's Item!: Adrian Hammer has a complete collection of insects but when he hears a tale of a new giant spider he travels to a island to see for himself.
A Trader in Treachery: A French traitor escapes to England but still faces a firing squad.
ComicInfo.Title: The Whip of Fear!; Collector's Item!; A Trader in Treachery
ComicInfo.Writer: Carl Wessler,George Kashdan,Henry Boltinoff,Jack Miller,George Kashdan,Jack Miller,Carl Wessler
